title: Fragment, 300–100 BC
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: stem stitch on plain weave
description: Standing human figure wearing an elaborate mask and headdress with serpents.  Figure holds a trophy head in one hand and a staff in the other.  Brightly colored embroidery covers the entire surface.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 300–100 BC.
300–100 BC. Medium: wool
Technique: stem stitch on plain weave. Bequest of Marian Hague. 1971-50-7.
